title: PC 7 March - 8 March proletarian and internationalist - strike and mobilizations on 8 and 9 March
content:
The companions, the workers of the MFPR in the cities where we are present we will strike workers in the various jobs and principals, events.

This year the center of this mobilization will be Milan/Bergamo
March 8: In the morning strike and principals to the factories - In the evening participation in the procession organized by Nudm in Milan
March 9: in the morning Flying initiatives of propaganda solidarity with the Palestinian women - the afternoon participation in the Pro Palestine event
For info, contacts, to participate in the initiatives: WA 3408429376
(let this flyer run)
*****
8 Marzo

on the side of the workers in struggle

on the side of Palestinian women

Workers indomitable - with all attacks on work, the blackmail of being first fired, with contracts that are made ultra precarious, undergoing discrimination on wages, personal, health attacks, discrimination also moved by racism towards immigrant workers, together with unqualified behaviors of heads up to sexual harassment - They fight, they don't stop.

Nobody can crush us, nobody can attack our dignity! For this, after the great demonstration of half a million people on November 25th, On March 8 we strike!

The workers, the workers in many countries of the world (see Bangladesh's textile workers) who suffer

Not an attack but all the attacks on masters, governments, and on whose life it falls not an oppression but all oppressions, sexual violence, feminicides - They take the struggle in their hands because all life must change, because the only "solution" is to overthrow this society. We are many and we are not sun!

Il Meloni government He grants everything to the masters and chatter, alms to working women; Meloni responds to the feminicides/rapes that are increasing with securitarian decrees, more police in the neighborhoods, while his squalids, hateful ministers offend women; this government He wants to take away all rights, first of all the right of abortion, because we must only serve to make more children, to give fresh meat to be exploited to the masters and for the homeland, wars, leaning all the work of family care, while He worsens health; A racist government that from suffering and death to our immigrant sisters; A government that wants to "educate" in schools, even children, to make wars, inculcating a nationalist humus, from "rambo", of abuse. The fascism of the Meloni government feeds a modern patriarchism of hateful males who react by killing, When women don't want to be submissive, they want to break ties.

The workers which by being together include the weapon of struggle, of unity, which there are no individual, private, but social, class conditions of this capitalist society, must take a collective struggle not only to defend themselves from the attacks of masters and government but to change their whole life and the majority of women, To change this world . This is our meaning of March 8.

Let's say to the workers: be bold, proud, more determined on everything. If we women do it, if we become "dangerous", the government force, masters, state can be cracked, and then, then ... reversed with the proletarian revolution of all exploited and oppressed, in which women bring an extra gear.

In this March 8, all our solidarity goes to Palestinian women, massacred, hungry in tens of thousands, who see their children killed by bombs and hunger, thirst, lack of medicines, which they cannot give birth in the bombarded hospitals, who abort on the street ... but women who they transform their immense pain in resistance. They are a example for all of us.

We call you workers, who know well the suffering, to give unconditional support to Palestinian women, to the resistance of the Palestinian people, against the criminal action of Israel; Against the wars that the imperialist states, including ours, are bringing to every part of the world.

There is a link between us and the Palestinian women who must become more and more concrete and stronger: They are also the Meloni government, the owners who in this country that build weapons, accomplices and responsible for genocide in Palestine; These monsters as our lives use for their profits, their reactionary, racist, repressive plans to prevent women's freedom; They are the same who want to crush the Palestinian people. The struggle of Palestinian women is our struggle, It helps us against this putrefied system, and the struggle of us working women is the struggle of the Palestinians because it weakens the imperialist monsters.

Long live the proletarian and internationalist March 8th!

Revolutionary proletarian feminist movement - Slai workers Cobas SC
